sourcing.instructions:
K2O can be obtained from potassium carbonate or potassium hydroxide from chemical supply stores. 
 P2O5 can be sourced from phosphorus pentoxide available at chemical suppliers. 
 SiO2 is typically found in silica gel or sand, available at hardware or chemical supply stores.
